[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@fgv/ts-bcp47](./ts-bcp47.md) &gt; [Bcp47](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.md) &gt; [tag](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.tag.md)

## Bcp47.tag() function

Creates a new [language tag](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagetag.md) from a [language specifier](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagespec.md)

The supplied initializer must be at least [well-formed according to RFC 5646](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc5646.html#section-2.2.9)<!-- -->. Higher degrees of validation along with any normalizations may be optionally specified.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function tag(from: LanguageSpec, options?: ILanguageTagInitOptions): Result<LanguageTag>;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

from


</td><td>

[LanguageSpec](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagespec.md)


</td><td>

The [language specifier](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagespec.md) from which the tag is to be created.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

[ILanguageTagInitOptions](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.ilanguagetaginitoptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ (optional) The [options](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.ilanguagetaginitoptions.md) used to construct and validate the tag.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[LanguageTag](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagetag.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with a valid [language tag](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagetag.md) or `Failure` with details if an error occurs.
